title: (x) Orange County Choppers logo blackletter - Mariage {Robert Farrelly}
content: I need for someone to ID the font used in the OCC logo so I can download it.
author: satanaka

comments.content:
here you go. it's the writing under the bike.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/paul_jr_800_5329.jpg)

tell me if the pic isn't big enough.

Thanks I got the logo myself! if you want the logo in a vector format go [here!](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071906/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/search/?action=search&text=orange+county+choppers)
Thanks. been racking my brain for 45 mins trying to figure out what it was.
The typeface Engravers Text is closer to what you need. Marriage (Wedding Text) is much lighter.

I think your looking at the above logo which seems to have a heavier typeface, this is the actual type used in the logo, which is Mariage D  
\>

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071906im_/http:/typophile.com/files/occ_6176.jpg)

The typeface used for the other ticker logo does seem to be engravers look at the g and the y to see the big difference in both logos!

I think your looking at the above logo which seems to have a heavier typeface, this is the actual type used in the logo  
\>
